meta.description: Optimize the number of cows, sheep, and chickens to maximize profit under constraints.

sets.name: ANIMALS
sets.description: Types of animals the farmer can raise.

params.name: selling_price
params.description: Selling price for each type of animal.

params.name: feed_cost
params.description: Feed cost for each type of animal.

params.name: manure_production
params.description: Manure production per day for each type of animal.

vars.name: num_animals
vars.description: Number of each type of animal to raise.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum((selling_price[a] - feed_cost[a]) * num_animals[a] for a in ['cows', 'sheep', 'chickens'])
objective.description: Maximize the profit from selling animals after deducting feed costs.

constraints.name: manure_limit
constraints.description: Total manure production must not exceed cleaning capacity.

constraints.name: chicken_limit
constraints.description: The number of chickens must not exceed 50.

constraints.name: min_cows
constraints.description: At least 10 cows must be raised to meet customer demand.

constraints.name: min_sheep
constraints.description: At least 20 sheep must be raised.

constraints.name: total_animals_limit
constraints.description: The total number of animals must not exceed 100.
